agent_utterance: Given the heat and BED risk, try this quick reset now: 1) 2-minute urge pause with 4 slow breaths, 2) 2 minutes of light movement (a short walk or gentle stretch), 3) drink a tall glass of cold water, 4) if the craving remains high, have a small prepped snack (berries or a little yogurt), 5) log the urge. If you’re already feeling settled, you can skip the snack and continue with hydration and your plan for later meals.

agent_utterance: Tonight's actionable plan: 1) Urge pause for 2 minutes with box breathing (4-4-4-4) and a quick grounding cue. 2) Do 2 minutes of light movement (gentle walk or stretch). 3) Drink a tall glass of cold water. 4) If the craving remains after the reset, have a small yogurt with berries (about 100 g yogurt and 40–60 g berries). If the craving subsides, skip the snack. 5) Log the urge in your tracker. If cravings spike at any point tonight, take a short 5-minute walk before deciding. Stay cool with the heat; keep the yogurt and water handy and use shade or a fan as needed.
